title: Indian forces deliberately target civilian population along LOC with heavy weapons
content:
RAWALPINDI, May 02 (APP):Indian Army troops on Saturday initiated unprovoked fire in Hajipir and Sankh Sectors along the line of control (LOC) deliberately targeting civilian population late last night.
Due to indiscriminate fire of automatics, rockets, heavy mortars and artillery, an innocent woman in Khwaja Bandi village, sustained serious injuries, said Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR).
The Injured was evacuated to nearby health facility and being provided with medical care.
